name: Renditions of the Awakening (itch)
description:
This is the demo for Renditions of the Awakening, a first-person strategy game based on summoning demons and then watching them kill everything they find. Give it a try, then please tell me what you love and hate about it at twitch.tv/user335 or on discord at user335#4246 or twitter at @user335. I will listen to all of it!

Controls: Left click to click on things or to throw a meat, right click is for pushing demons out of your way if you get stuck, and both and once to throw an armful of meat.

v1.01 Patch Notes: 

improved bug aliens switching targets after killings demons
turned player collision detection back on (oops)

fixed a text line in the end
made it so you can sometimes walk over destroyed building foundations when very close to the terrain height
